Class SectionPresenter

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModel
      • com.didactapp.didact.presenters.SectionPresenter
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    BasePresenter<SectionContract.View>, SectionContract.Presenter, RemoteGatewayCallback<java.util.List<Section>>, LocalGatewayCallback<Section> 

    public final class SectionPresenter
extends android.arch.lifecycle.ViewModel
implements SectionContract.Presenter, RemoteGatewayCallback<java.util.List<Section>>, LocalGatewayCallback<Section>
    class to handle books presentation logic
